content: उदानः [अन्-घञ्] {@--1@} Breathing upwards. {@--2@} Breathing, breath in general. {@--3@} One of the five vital airs or life-winds which rises up the throat and enters into the head; the other four being प्राण, अपान, समान and व्यान; स्पंदयत्यधरं वक्त्रं गात्रनेत्रप्रकोपनः . उद्वेजयति मर्मणि उदानो नाम मारुतः ... {@--4@} (With Buddhists) An expression of praise or joy. {@--5@} The navel. {@--6@} An eye-lash. {@--7@} A kind of snake.
